00083     int     left() const        {return m_x0;}
00084 
00088     int     right() const       {return m_x1;}
00089 
00093     int     top() const         {return m_y0;}
00094 
00098     int     bottom() const      {return m_y1;}
00099 
00103     int     width() const       {return m_x1-m_x0;}
00104 
00108     int     height() const      {return m_y1-m_y0;}
00109 
00113     int     area() const        {return width()*height();}
00114

00117     int m_y0;
